fact.description: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in France.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a Nigeria throw-in in France's half.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in France territory.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Can Nigeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Corner awarded to France.
France's Olivier Giroud attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Nigeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
France have a goal kick.
Mark Geiger signals a France throw-in in Nigeria's half.
In Brasilia, Emmanuel Emenike of Nigeria is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for France at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
France will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nigeria.
Ogenyi Eddy Onazi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The match is underway again.
In Brasilia, Emmanuel Emenike (Nigeria) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Olivier Giroud of France gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
Nigeria's Ogenyi Eddy Onazi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick Nigeria.
In Brasilia Nigeria attack through Emmanuel Emenike. The finish is off target, however.
Mark Geiger awards France a goal kick.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Nigeria.
Throw-in for Nigeria in their own half.
Nigeria drive forward but Emmanuel Emenike is judged offside.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to France.
Karim Benzema for France is whistled offside.
Ball safe as France is awarded a throw-in in their half.
France to take a throw-in in Nigeria territory.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
Free kick Nigeria.
Paul Pogba for France drives towards goal at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia . But the finish is unsuccessful.
France have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Corner awarded to France.
Important block from the France defence as Ogenyi Eddy Onazi fires in a strike for Nigeria.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
France have a dangerous throw-in.
Nigeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to France.
Throw-in for Nigeria at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Mark Geiger awards Nigeria a goal kick.
France's Paul Pogba gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nigeria defender.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in France.
Can Nigeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Peter Odemwingie (Nigeria) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Can France capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nigeria's half?
Corner awarded to France.
Mathieu Debuchy for France gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nigeria have a goal kick.
In Brasilia France's Yohan Cabaye is caught offside.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Ball goes out of play for a France goal kick.
Ball safe as Nigeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
France's Mathieu Debuchy misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Throw-in Nigeria.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a France throw-in in Nigeria's half.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Nigeria drive forward and Emmanuel Emenike gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in France territory.
France have a goal kick.
France's Laurent Koscielny has run offside.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in France territory.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Free kick France.
The first-half is over.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
Mark Geiger signals a Nigeria throw-in in France's half.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
The match in Brasilia is underway once more.
Juwon Oshaniwa is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Corner awarded to France.
Juwon Oshaniwa for Nigeria is back on the field again.
Emmanuel Emenike of Nigeria is pulled up for offside.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Raphael Varane.
Mark Geiger has blown to resume play in Brasilia.
Blaise Matuidi for France has been booked by Mark Geiger and receives a first yellow card.
The match at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia  has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ogenyi Eddy Onazi, who is down injured.
France's Raphael Varane is back in action after a slight knock.
Play has been resumed at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Throw-in for Nigeria close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stephen Keshi (Nigeria) is making a first change, with Reuben Shalu Gabriel replacing the possibly injured Ogenyi Eddy Onazi.
Nigeria's Emmanuel Emenike breaks free at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia . But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for France at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Mark Geiger signals a throw-in for Nigeria, close to France's area.
Antoine Griezmann is on a sub for Olivier Giroud for France.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Nigeria.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nigeria's Peter Odemwingie is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick France.
Nigeria needs to be cautious. France have an attacking throw-in.
Mark Geiger signals a throw-in for France, close to Nigeria's area.
Free kick France.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Throw-in for France at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
Karim Benzema of France smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The match at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia  is underway again.
Attention is being given to Nigeria’s Efe Eric Ambrose and play has been suspended briefly.
Ball safe as Nigeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nigeria’s Efe Eric Ambrose is on his feet again at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Throw-in for Nigeria at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
France's Karim Benzema gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Mark Geiger awards Nigeria a goal kick.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
France have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Corner awarded to France.
Mark Geiger signals a France throw-in in Nigeria's half.
Throw-in Nigeria.
France drive upfield and Karim Benzema gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nigeria defender.
Yohan Cabaye (France) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Throw-in for Nigeria in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to France.
Karim Benzema (France) strikes at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia  but his header is cleared.
Goal! France take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Paul Pogba.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in France territory.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to France in their own half.
France's Antoine Griezmann gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia . But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to France.
Victor Moses (Nigeria) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to France.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a Nigeria throw-in in France's half.
Free kick France.
Stephen Keshi is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia  with Uche Nwofor replacing Victor Moses.
Throw-in for France close to the penalty box.
France have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the second half.
Corner awarded to France.
Own goal! Joseph Yobo scores in his own net to make it 2-0.
Goal kick for France at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
France make their second substitution with Moussa Sissoko replacing Mathieu Valbuena.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
